body:
<!--StartFragment-->

Are you seeking an arena of fellowship with divinity? Look no further! Worship Exodus creates that atmosphere, where people from different churches can worship God as one.

\
Featuring both national and international artists, this event occurs only once annually.

[![](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mOrjaOSfopE/XcXbaA2k5KI/AAAAAAAAAtc/I5TGy338KtQiJlY1_BaBeoQ70_5afIZ8QCLcBGAsYHQ/s320/Cyril.jpg)](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mOrjaOSfopE/XcXbaA2k5KI/AAAAAAAAAtc/I5TGy338KtQiJlY1_BaBeoQ70_5afIZ8QCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/Cyril.jpg)

\
Meet Cyril Bisong aka "Super Cyril", the chief organizer of Worship Exodus. Being a coach, singer and a student, the single father returns home to his little "princess" Arielle Williams.\
\
Good thing, that talent will be passed on to the next generation

[![](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-HX_Iulhu32w/XcXJ7GVYVmI/AAAAAAAAAtI/KakdAlLjQik8TDmTioa3_r8t0vUOPbs-ACEwYBhgL/s1600/WE3.jpg)](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-HX_Iulhu32w/XcXJ7GVYVmI/AAAAAAAAAtI/KakdAlLjQik8TDmTioa3_r8t0vUOPbs-ACEwYBhgL/s1600/WE3.jpg)

[![](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-of8pxszrSBU/XcXJ7Mru_II/AAAAAAAAAtE/AMRX_QxwBOkZrCuu0u70Cz3i2_F3ESO1gCEwYBhgL/s1600/WE2.jpg)](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-of8pxszrSBU/XcXJ7Mru_II/AAAAAAAAAtE/AMRX_QxwBOkZrCuu0u70Cz3i2_F3ESO1gCEwYBhgL/s1600/WE2.jpg)

September 2019 marked the first-ever Worship Exodus experience, recording mindblowing testimonies, all thanks to God.

Worship Exodus appreciates every gospel minister who partook in the event, especially Pastor Okala of Full Gospel Buea Town.

The good news is, come next season, the event might be hosting an international guest artist. So, don't miss it

<!--EndFragment-->
summary: Are you seeking an arena of fellowship with divinity? Look no further! Worship Exodus creates that atmosphere, where people from different churches can worship God as one.
author: dIyA2l79NifO81mlNIh6t

title: Experience glory at "Worship Exodus"
